short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to get transcriptions through AssemblyAI API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension to get transcriptions through AssemblyAI API. Also includes speaker identification.

For personal use mostly, but if people want more features I can add them.

Update 1.1:
Now can handle much bigger files, and has some instructions. 

Update 1.2:
Saves your API key so you don't need to keep re-entering.
